paper_abstract: We present a multiphase mathematical model for tumor growth which incorporates the remodeling of the extracellular matrix and describes the formation of fibrotic tissue by tumor cells. Wealso detail a full qualitative analysis of the spatially homogeneous problem, and study the equilibria of the system in order to characterize the conditions under which fibrosis may occur. (C) 2010 Elsevier Ltd. All rights reserved.
paper_title: Multiphase modeling of tumor growth with matrix remodeling and fibrosis
